title: Klp1122
author: Klp1122
content: Hello dear bounty Admin sir your tream  trusted my account...some folse information in my account..i am extraimly sorry for that some people  copy my prof.and same telegram name...i am soo sorry....Please removed my trust...please...Thank you soo much

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: I do not see any good reason you created a thread about this, it is clear and obvious that you have alts and you used it to participate in the same campaign which is against one of the rules of the campaign and you have been tagged with negative trust. The best way to go is to PM the people that have given you negative trust, but they wouldn't remove the negative trust because you are a bounty cheater.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: Klp1122 on May 22, 2022, 04:49:46 PMsome folse information in my account..i am extraimly sorry for that some people  copy my prof.and same telegram name...i am soo sorry....What an awful excuse, and this proves that you are dishonest and a lair.According to that data, it would seem that you are the one who "copied" the POA. Look at the dates of application Quote from: BountyDetective on May 10, 2022, 12:43:37 PMProof:Quote from: Klp1122 on May 09, 2022, 07:21:16 AMTelegram Username: @Rasel2963[ archive ]Quote from: Ara121 on April 04, 2022, 02:10:14 PMTelegram Username: @Rasel2963[ archive ]Quote from: balimiami on February 03, 2022, 01:57:27 PMTelegram Username: @Rasel2963Discord Username: Ariful07#5546[ archive ]Quote from: Ariful07 on May 05, 2022, 02:31:10 PMDiscord Username: Ariful07#5546[ archive ]Congratulations, you are your alt accounts have earned more red trust from me.

comments.author: The Sceptical Chymist
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on May 22, 2022, 09:00:09 PMCongratulations, you are your alt accounts have earned more red trust from me.Nice job sniffing that info out, and I've negged OP and his alt accounts as well.  Unfortunately, bounty abusers are like cockroaches--when you see one, there are usually many more hiding in the woodwork where you can't see them.  So I'm betting those 3 accounts aren't the only ones OP controls.  I'm also hoping that bounty managers are still taking forum trust into account when they decide which members to accept.  I know sig campaign managers do, but I'm fairly ignorant as to what happens in the altcoin/bounty sections.

comments.author: TheUltraElite
comments.body: Quote from: Klp1122 on May 22, 2022, 04:49:46 PMHello dear bounty Admin sir your tream  trusted my account...some folse information in my account..i am extraimly sorry for that some people  copy my prof. Strange is it not, why someone else is going to use the accounts details that you have been using to send you payments but work on their own, like a sort of slave. Unless of course it is you behind all those accounts.Quoteand same telegram name...i am soo sorry.... Be sorry for yourself mate. You tried to cheat some campaigns and you got caught, I hope you learnt your lesson that trying to steal money that is no yours will get you in trouble here. That is to do justice to those who are honestly trying to get rewards in the same campaigns but not using more than one account.QuotePlease removed my trust...please... If you shut down your other accounts and only contribute to the forum from one account, then there is a bleak chance that DT members might rethink but it will not happen in a month or two.

comments.author: GeorgeJohn
comments.body: From the prove brought to board @ JeromeTash it shown that op you are the one that copie everything, if you want to attest to something else try to bring a clear evidence of it. And many people is showing or telling fact that you have numerous bitcointalk account, so for you to grow well you have to concentrate to one specific account and channel your knowledge into it. Except you have something else that consumed your time.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Ariful07 Sent me a private message today which I would like to share. Maybe I Missed out some detail and other members can help me point it out.He claims that he is innocent, and the other cheater alt account copied his POA details which he had posted earlier on 14 December 2021.I am open to changing the feedback I left on the profile in case the user is innocent, but what am I missing here?Here is the full body of the message;Quote from: Ariful07 on May 23, 2022, 02:00:17 PMTo ,The Forum management.Subject: Red trust taken.Dear sir,Please see the below information,My Bitcointalk Username is Ariful07.My BTT profile link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=2858702My account  has been red trust but why Sir,I don't know this account information .@Rasel2963 is not My Telegram account.Brainboss BM Sir and Bounty Detactive managerKept to account connected.1. Klp11222. Ara1213. balimiami4. Ariful07Report Related account:Telegram Username: @Rasel2963Discord Username: Ariful07#5546I have cleared, My discord Username is Ariful07#5546 but It  is not My Telegram Username @Rasel2963 I have given all proof.Sir, I don't given  any false information.My account is not related with other accounts.See theValuesDAO bounty all information.I have  given first proof.I don't join this ValuesDAO bounty in Discord Campaign.ValuesDAO bounty link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5376858.0Please see the actual scamer proof link.I wantto say  balimiami is a scamer. Only he has given proof.He has used my Discord Username.Please check all proof and take proper steps.I am joining  the 33 number in ValuesDAO bountyI have joined the 14 December 2021.My Authentication proof link:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5376858.msg58715363#msg58715363Balimiami proof link numbers is 2594 in ValuesDAO bounty. He is joined the 03 February 2022.Balimiami proof link:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5376858.msg59147238#msg59147238Ariful07 in screenshot picture link:http://ibn.im/u8YyuMSScamer Balimiami screenshot picture link:http://ibn.im/GUR5iSd Every time, I have published the your bounty. Any bounty participants copy my  information. So I don't suffer this problem.I am many suffer this problem andFinding the value bounty one to one hundred fourthy pages and collect the proof.All  proof check and take proper action.I am sure , he is a scamerPlease take the red trust and give  me work opportunity.Thanks.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on May 23, 2022, 09:47:11 PM~I got the same PM, word for word.  It was probably addressed (and sent) to BountyDetective, then copied to anyone who left a red-tag.  It's hard to make out because he copied BountyDetective's post in the Alts Thread, but didn't use quote code.  Basically it's a bunch of rambling excuses and links to nothing that prove anything, and screenshots of nothing that prove anything.  Anyway, I was looking for instances where the discord username "Ariful07#5546" appeared without the username "Ariful07" to put "reasonable doubt" to the test.  I only found the one instance, the same one quoted in the Alts Thread.  But that's not all, I found that Ariful07 and at least one of the alts are posting in the bounty threads in very close time intervals.Here's one particular occurrence with a mere 8-second gap:Quote from: Klp1122 on March 30, 2022, 01:24:08 PMQuote from: Ariful07 on March 30, 2022, 01:24:16 PMAnd another example, bounty applications only 6 minutes apart:Quote from: Ariful07 on March 09, 2022, 01:19:00 PMQuote from: Klp1122 on March 09, 2022, 01:25:09 PMThere were others, and I don't care to post any more evidence.  I was looking for evidence indicating the tag is wrong, but now I'm convinced it's accurate.  In bounty threads with literally hundreds of pages, yet these two appear in close proximity to each other quite regularly.  What are the odds of that happening with non-alts?

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on May 24, 2022, 02:33:28 AM-snip-Thanks for the findings. Turns out the accounts are alts, and he is the same liar.I am not going to change the feedback. He has been spamming the hell out of my inbox with the same copy-pasted message over and over again. I just had to temporarily disable receiving PMs from Newbies.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on May 24, 2022, 09:06:00 PMHe has been spamming the hell out of my inbox with the same copy-pasted message over and over again. I just had to temporarily disable receiving PMs from Newbies.He just spammed with the same copy/paste wall of text on Telegram.  There was no additional information provided, just incessantly claiming that Balimiami is a scammer and demanding that the trust be removed.  If there is some evidence that he's not part of this farm, I would love to see it, but all the evidence seems to indicate that he is.I noticed that BountyDetective edited his post in Alts Thread to remove Ariful07, and he and CryptopreneurBrainboss removed their review.@CryptopreneurBrainboss and @BountyDetective, can you please provide us with a reason you've chosen to remove your review and accusation against this user?

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on May 23, 2022, 09:47:11 PMAriful07 Sent me a private message today which I would like to share. Maybe I Missed out some detail and other members can help me point it out.He claims that he is innocentI've got the same message. And I guess that it was not only the two of us receiving it.Spamming with PM is not nice (I've threatened him I'll give red feedback for spam if he messages me again), and it shows that:* he's desperate* he doesn't really care about rules and being niceThis is how I see it.I don't know the entire drama, but I trusted that at least some of those giving red feedback did check the proof.Even more, your post shows pretty much all that's needed. So.. why you bother more than you should?!

comments.author: Ariful07
comments.created_time: May 26, 2022, 03:42:15 AMLast edit: May 26, 2022, 03:57:06 AM by Ariful07
comments.body: ToThe Forum administration Subject: Application for the red trust remove.Dear sir, with due respect to Known Alts of anyone A User Generated list MK IV (2022 Q2).My BTT username Ariful07 has been red trust. Bunty Detective BM has made a report against  Ariful07. I have announced. I don't Bounty cheating and lier. I have cleared, My discord Username is Ariful07#5546 but It  is not My Telegram Username @Rasel2963Bounty DetactiveBM and Brainboss BM has withdraw repots on  Bounty cheating .Bounty Detactive manager report on red trust withdraw link:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5394559.msg60093887#msg60093887See the all  proof :ValuesDAO bounty link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5376858.0Please see the actual scamer proof link.I wantto say  balimiami is a scamer. Only he has given Authentication post.He has used my Discord Username.I am joining  the 33 number in ValuesDAO bountyI have joined the 14 December 2021.My Authentication proof link:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5376858.msg58715363#msg58715363Balimiami proof link numbers is 2594 in ValuesDAO bounty. He is joined the 03 February 2022.Balimiami proof link:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5376858.msg59147238#msg59147238Ariful07 in screenshot picture proof link:http://ibn.im/u8YyuMSScamer Balimiami screenshot picture proof link:http://ibn.im/GUR5iSdAny bounty participants copy my  information. So why would I suffer from this problem. The Pharmacist, DireWolfM14 and JeromeTash are not withdraw  trust but why ? Why do these managers identify me red trust. Based on that report, Ariful 07 was assaulted. that report removed by Bounty Detactive BM. So I have cleared to say, I don't bounty cheating.I want justice for Forum. Please check it and give  me work opportunity.Thanks.

comments.author: ololajulo
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on May 22, 2022, 05:48:04 PMI do not see any good reason you created a thread about this, it is clear and obvious that you have alts and you used it to participate in the same campaign which is against one of the rules of the campaign and you have been tagged with negative trust. The best way to go is to PM the people that have given you negative trust, but they wouldn't remove the negative trust because you are a bounty cheater.Can negative trust be reversed or removed?

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: ololajulo on May 26, 2022, 09:14:30 PMCan negative trust be reversed or removed?It can be reversed/removed by the person who sent if they have a change of heart or if they get convinced the person the tagged is innocent.Admin can also remove it, but he is not the kind of person who wants to interfere with the trust system, so don't expect him to ever remove or reverse such negative tags. I don't even remember him removing any such feedback.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on May 26, 2022, 09:21:26 PMAdmin can also remove itI don't think that's true.  I mean, theymos can remove the whole forum, or go hardcore on the PHP code and implement any feature he chooses.  As for trust feedback I don't think he has given himself (and other administrators) the ability to remove other peoples' feedback in such a trivial way such as clicking a button.  I may be wrong, but that's my assumption.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on May 26, 2022, 09:21:26 PMAdmin can also remove itNo admin had removed negative trust before in the past and theymos does not want to interfere with that. Only the person that gave the positive, neutral or negative trust can remove it.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on May 26, 2022, 09:53:13 PMI don't think that's true.  I mean, theymos can remove the whole forum, or go hardcore on the PHP code and implement any feature he chooses.  As for trust feedback I don't think he has given himself (and other administrators) the ability to remove other peoples' feedback in such a trivial way such as clicking a button.  I may be wrong, but that's my assumption.Quote from: Charles-Tim on May 26, 2022, 09:56:46 PMQuote from: JeromeTash on May 26, 2022, 09:21:26 PMAdmin can also remove itNo admin had removed negative trust before in the past and theymos does not want to interfere with that. Come to remember one incident, he actually did remove trust feedback though it was a special case of Trust spamming. Of course, he can't remove feedback like in OP's case.
